EmoteActions.Message: ArikasSpoken
KnorrWait
KnorrGem1

Hail! It has come to my attention, through means at my disposal, that Asheron has recently visited his old school somewhere far from Dereth. I'd be willing to assist you in getting there if you promise to do something for me.
StartKnorr
KnorrWait

I am sure that the structure contains a great many books that pertain to the history of this world. We are looking for any information that you may be able to gather there. Return the books to me  so that Nuhmudira's school might thrive.
If you would agree to such an exchange I will only ask for a small gesture of good will, shall we say an M note?
Should you return the books to me I will ensure that you are given this expenditure upon your return.
KnorrGem1@01
KnorrWait@01
I'm sorry I am not willing to send someone along before I have explained all there is to know of this undertaking, besides you may find my offer... beneficial.

I'm sorry, I am not willing to send someone along before I have explained all there is to know of this undertaking; besides you haven't really ever been anywhere that interesting, from the looks of you.
KnorrWait@02
So what do you think you are trying to pull, I don't remember your face. You should really just get out of here.
Olcris looks at you incredulously.
What? You want this back. I have my orders and they clearly say that any and all information gathered from the Lyceum should be given to Nuhmudira. I'm not going to cross her.

BookTurnedIn

BookTurnedIn@08
BookTurnedIn@09
I am sorry but your life would be over too quickly if you went where I would send you.
level_test
What are you doing here? Why don't you give me an M note and get started on your mission? Nuhmudira and her students won't wait forever you know.

I see that you have reached the Seat of Knorr. If you pay me an MMD note I'll weave up a gem that will take you back to that very spot. Just make sure to speak to the golem there, if you want to back there quick again.
I am sorry, but I think that you lack the cognitive capacity to ascertain the memorandums and literature that we seek. Please take some time to think about your failure, perhaps 3 days.
If you've lost something of worth to you at the Lyceum or you simply wish to return to it, I can assist you but, it cost you an M note for the return trip.
StartKnorr
KnorrGem1

Once you use this gem you will be on your own. Knorr has no portals, we assume for fear that the Olthoi that have not completely been removed would find a way through to Dereth. You will need to have your own transportation home. You have been warned.
KnorrGem1
This is all you'll get from me. I need results. If you don't bring me something this time then no more gems for you.
I am afraid that there is no more for you until you've thought about your failures for a little while shall we say... 3 days. Begone.
ArikasSpoken
Speak to the Golem again and maybe I'll be able to craft another one of these for you.
Hey! You're trying to pull one over on me eh?
Olcris looks at you angrily.
I'll keep this, cause Nuhmudira might like it, but you're note getting anything else from me moneywise. Begone.
Ah, good work. Nuhmudira will be pleased that you held up your end of the bargain. Now let me take care of my end.
BookTurnedIn
